short_summary: One (1) Truck Fire Fighting Pumper for delivery to Shearwater, NS, with a requested delivery date of 400 days after receipt of order (ARO).
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure quantity of one (1) Truck Fire Fighting Pumper for delivery to Shearwater, NS. The requested delivery date is 400 days after receipt of order (ARO). An option for one (1) Truck Fire Fighting Pumper is included for delivery within Canada. GSIN: N4210.

full_summary:
# Truck Fire Fighting Pumper Tender

**Solicitation Information**

* **Tender Reference:** W8476-246744/B
* **Publication Date:** March 21, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 5, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Number:** 6
* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Various Free Trade Agreements, including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Tender Description**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to provide one (1) Truck Fire Fighting Pumper for delivery to Shearwater, NS, with an option for an additional unit. The delivery date is 400 days after receipt of order. The solicitation includes electronic receipt of bids by email only.

**Important Notes**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Electronic submission of bids is required; for details, please review the section entitled Electronic Submission of Bids in the solicitation document.
* Bids must be submitted by email only to: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

**Attachments**

A package of relevant documents is available online at:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34562/en-rfp-w8476-246744-b_amendment-003.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34562/bt404_w8476-246744-_b_rfp-original_2.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34562/en-rfp-w8476-246744-b_amendment-002-plus-pd_0_0.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34562/en-rfp-w8476-246744-b_amendment-001.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34562/en-rfp-w8476-246744-b_amendment-005.pdf
